root.message: The STAT_CONC_DEF field for indicator 6-1-1, translated into en
root.data: This is the percentage between the number of households (or of the population) obtaining water from facilities deemed capable of supplying drinking water (connections to the running water distribution network, standpipes, boreholes equipped with pump, gravity water supply or rural pumping) and the total number of households (or the total population) at the national level.
